Literature.Title: De novo antimicrobial peptides with low mammalian cell toxicity.
Literature.Author: Javadpour MM, Juban MM, Lo WC, Bishop SM, Alberty JB, Cowell SM, Becker CL, McLaughlin ML

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=>570 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:99% Killing=>393 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=100µM)
